thawath nam kirim : apa kothanada, sinhalaya kalayata watina lipipelak obawetha labadenna sithuna mema lipi itha parana lipipelak wana athara nuthanaye sitinnawunta manawa galapena thanda atha,kesey wethath apa samajaya hadagasi thibenuye meya ahawal pudgalaya kalayuthuya kiyaya ema nisawen pidawata pathwana ahinsaka minisun apramanaya,rakiya labadennata lekana gathakirimwalata athulath karannata rakiya labanna wirudda pakshikayakunam ohuta rakiyawa labanodimata tharam amanushika thathwayak atha,rakiyawa denne nam ohuge mulu sanhathiyama ema pakshaya wenuwen kapa wiya yuthuya,bahutharayak siduwanne palamu thathwayamaya,ese ma pakshawala balapam walata laknowuna siwil wasiyan sitinuye itha sulu pramanayaki,samaharun pakshawala athakolu wanatharamata balaya asimithaya mita adala charitha obata sihiganwenu atha,mema lipi pela thula kisiyam wu paniwidayak atha athipujya madihe panynyasiha mahanayaka mahimipanan wahanse wisin karana laddaki, sinhala bhashawa iparani ya.
